title: 不好啦，粗大事了，伯尼桑德斯和伊丽莎白沃伦撕起来了！
contents:
https://twitter.com/CNN/status/1216896165997895681

Sen. Elizabeth Warren said Sen. Bernie Sanders told her in 2018 a woman couldn't win the presidency, following a CNN report Monday. Sanders denies it.

沃伦说2018年桑德斯告诉她，女人赢不了总统。桑德斯否认这一说法。

https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1216743062543663105

Bernie Sander’s volunteers are trashing Elizabeth “Pocahontus” Warren. Everybody knows her campaign is dead and want her potential voters. Mini Mike B is also trying, but getting tiny crowds which are all leaving fast. Elizabeth is very angry at Bernie. Do I see a feud brewing?

川普看热闹不嫌事大。咦，你们俩怎么撕起来啦？

评：玩政治正确，打性别牌种族牌，迟早要作茧自缚。
